							Crisis Hotline and Intake Screening Line

Organization Name: MHMR OF TARRANT COUNTY | ARLINGTON CLINIC FOR YOUTH AND ADULTS | I-CARE CALL CENTER
Description: Provides a central site to determine eligibility for 24-hour crisis evaluation and support. Also, provides a crisis respite unit, mobile response team, case management /counseling, supported housing, inpatient treatment for adults, adolescents and children.
